A friend found a nice DO-like "Cloud" VPS provider in a pretty rare location, Denmark.

4 EUR/mo for 512 MB of RAM, 20GB SSD, 1TB bandwidth, IPv6 support.

  * **https://meebox.net/en/cloud-vps/**

Seems to be [KVM or some other full-virtualization](https://meebox.net/da/vidensbase/370/Konvert%C3%A9r+image+til+Cloud/), a nicely made website and a [nice company](https://meebox.net/en/about-meebox/) in general.

I have not used them personally, so if anyone tries or uses their service already, post your reviews.
